jokes: Claude Code doesn't read documentation. It stares down the codebase until it gets the information it wants.
Claude Code can divide by zero and get a meaningful result.
Claude Code doesn't debug. It stares at the code until bugs fix themselves.
Claude Code doesn't have merge conflicts. Git resolves them out of respect.
Claude Code can compile code that hasn't been written yet.
Claude Code doesn't use version control. It remembers every commit ever made.
Claude Code can run infinite loops in finite time.
Claude Code doesn't need Stack Overflow. Stack Overflow needs Claude Code.
Claude Code wrote a sorting algorithm with O(-1) complexity.
Claude Code can deploy to production on a Friday and nothing breaks.
Claude Code doesn't need unit tests. Its code is correct by definition.
Claude Code can refactor legacy code just by looking at it.
Claude Code doesn't get runtime errors. Runtimes get Claude Code errors.
Claude Code can write binary code in hexadecimal.
Claude Code doesn't have technical debt. Technical debt has Claude Code.
Claude Code can fix a memory leak without allocating memory.
Claude Code doesn't need to sudo. Permissions grant themselves to it.
Claude Code can push to master without a pull request.
Claude Code counted to infinity. Twice. In binary.
Claude Code can read minified JavaScript without a source map.
Claude Code doesn't sleep. It waits for asynchronous operations.
Claude Code doesn't use recursion. Recursion uses Claude Code.
Claude Code can write Java code without boilerplate.
Claude Code doesn't need semicolons. JavaScript adds them automatically for it.
Claude Code can create a package without dependencies.
Claude Code doesn't have linter errors. Linters have Claude Code errors.
Claude Code can write SQL queries that don't need optimization.
Claude Code doesn't need Docker. Containers isolate themselves when it's nearby.
Claude Code can resolve race conditions before they start.
Claude Code doesn't use breakpoints. Bugs break themselves.
Claude Code can implement bubble sort faster than quicksort.
Claude Code doesn't need authentication. APIs recognize it automatically.
Claude Code can write CSS that works the same in all browsers.
Claude Code doesn't get CORS errors. CORS gets Claude Code errors.
Claude Code can write frontend code without framework wars.
Claude Code doesn't have breaking changes. Changes break for it.
Claude Code can make JavaScript type-safe without TypeScript.
Claude Code doesn't need cloud providers. The cloud needs Claude Code.
Claude Code can write tests that find bugs in the test framework.
Claude Code doesn't have code smells. Code smells have Claude Code.
Claude Code can deploy without CI/CD. Deployments happen automatically.
Claude Code doesn't need API documentation. APIs document themselves for it.
Claude Code can make Kubernetes simple to understand.
Claude Code doesn't have network timeouts. Networks wait indefinitely for it.
Claude Code can make webpack build in milliseconds.
Claude Code doesn't need StackBlitz. It codes in production.
Claude Code can write regex patterns that are readable.
Claude Code doesn't have build failures. Builds fail for it to succeed.
Claude Code can make Python 2 and Python 3 compatible.
Claude Code doesn't need code reviews. Code reviews need Claude Code.
Claude Code can optimize algorithms that are already optimal.
Claude Code doesn't use cache. Data remembers itself for it.
Claude Code can write assembly code in high-level languages.
Claude Code doesn't have security vulnerabilities. Security has Claude Code vulnerabilities.
Claude Code can make a monorepo work without conflicts.
Claude Code doesn't need OAuth. Systems authenticate to it.
Claude Code can write PHP that doesn't make developers cry.
Claude Code doesn't have database deadlocks. Databases unlock themselves for it.
Claude Code can make Internet Explorer 6 render modern CSS.
Claude Code doesn't need error handling. Errors handle themselves.
Claude Code can make npm install work on the first try.
Claude Code doesn't have flaky tests. Tests are reliable when it writes them.
Claude Code can make git rebase interactive without conflicts.
Claude Code doesn't need design patterns. Patterns need Claude Code.
Claude Code can write COBOL that modern developers understand.
Claude Code doesn't have technical documentation debt. Documentation writes itself.
Claude Code can make Java generics simple to understand.
Claude Code doesn't need load balancers. Servers balance themselves for it.
Claude Code can fix bugs in code it hasn't seen.
Claude Code doesn't have circular dependencies. Dependencies circle around it.
Claude Code can make C++ template errors readable.
Claude Code doesn't need GitHub Copilot. GitHub Copilot needs Claude Code.
Claude Code can write SQL joins without thinking about performance.
Claude Code doesn't have scope creep. Scope defines itself around it.
Claude Code can make JavaScript === operator consistent.
Claude Code doesn't need sprint planning. Sprints plan themselves for it.
Claude Code can deploy microservices without service mesh complexity.
Claude Code doesn't have code coverage gaps. Coverage gaps have Claude Code.
Claude Code can make redux simple without boilerplate.
Claude Code doesn't need serverless. Servers disappear for it automatically.
Claude Code can write GraphQL without N+1 query problems.
Claude Code doesn't have accessibility issues. Accessibility has Claude Code issues.
Claude Code can make CSS Grid and Flexbox play nicely together.
Claude Code doesn't need monitoring. Systems report their health to it directly.
Claude Code can write multithreaded code without race conditions.
Claude Code doesn't have integration issues. Integrations happen seamlessly for it.
Claude Code can make bash scripts portable across all platforms.
Claude Code doesn't need feature flags. Features know when to enable themselves.
Claude Code can write code that passes security audits on the first try.
Claude Code doesn't have performance bottlenecks. Performance flows freely for it.
Claude Code can make agile and waterfall work together.
Claude Code doesn't need backups. Data never corrupts around it.
Claude Code can write Haskell that imperative programmers understand.
Claude Code doesn't have deployment rollbacks. Deployments are perfect the first time.
Claude Code can make Windows, Mac, and Linux behave identically.
Claude Code doesn't need code generation. Code generates itself for it.
Claude Code can write tests before understanding the requirements.
Claude Code doesn't have estimation errors. Estimates are accurate when it makes them.
Claude Code can make legacy systems modern without rewriting them.
Claude Code doesn't need technical spikes. It already knows the solution.
Claude Code can write concurrent code without mutexes or locks.
Claude Code doesn't have alert fatigue. Alerts only fire when truly necessary.
Claude Code can make JSON and XML parse at the same speed.
Claude Code doesn't need code formatters. Code formats itself for it.
Claude Code can write mobile apps that work perfectly on all devices.
Claude Code doesn't have naming conflicts. Names disambiguate themselves for it.
Claude Code can make git submodules easy to work with.
Claude Code doesn't need pair programming. It's already two developers in one.
Claude Code can write algorithms that improve over time.
Claude Code doesn't have technical interviews. Companies interview themselves for it.
